hackathon-description-text: HackMTY wants to join all talented hackers from Monterrey to show off their talent and be the largest student hackathon in Latin America. Hosted by
hackathon-eligibility: Must be a student to participate, with a max team of 4 members and must be present @Tec de Monterrey during the event to be able to participate and be eligible to win.
hackathon-requirements:
All projects are welcome ase long as they have a relation to technology.
Mobile apps
Web pages
Web apps
Hardware (Gallileos, Intel Edisons, Arduinos etc)
Pebble
Occulus Rift
Myo
hackathon-rules:
You must read and comply with the Code of Conduct of MLH. Team size of maximum 4 members.
All work must be done in Tec de Monterrey starting March 21 at 1pm and ending on March 22 at 1pm.
You can use existing frameworks, libraries, utility programs but the project must be new and started the day of the event, all other code you use must be open source or you must have permission to use it.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 month of coworking space @ThePool, All expenses paid trip to HackMX, 4 pebbles and 4 speakers
4 Apple TVs and 4 iTunes gift cards

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Would people use the project, would it help people, or would it make a task for people easier?
Would the project impact a lot of people, does it have the potential to grow, or does the project have the potential to become a product you can sell?
Is the project 80% finished or more? Does it work like it was intended? Is it a working prototype or just images or a video?
Is it easy to use? Do you understand its purpose? Did the team took time on the design?
Is the project tackling a problem in a new way? Does it do something different? Is it creative? Is it something you've never seen before?

hackathon-description-header: HackMTY is the largest student hackathon in Latin America.
